Articles.Content:
Hello! This is just my way of letting people on the forums know I am streaming!

http://www.twitch.tv/orbitusii/new

I don't stream gameplay (yet) due to a pitifully powerful laptop, but I cover news for KSP and Puffin Technologies along with providing some feedback for Squad (if any of the devs watch me ).

Come one, come all for science and news!
